bibl.title: Scribes and Schoolmasters? On Contextualizing Coptic and Greek Ostraca Excavated at the Monastery of Epiphanius
bibl.note: Paper delivered to the Byzantium and Medieval World Conference, University of Cambridge, April 29, 2000. - Introduction. - Languages and the Monastery of Epiphanius. - Building a Context: Winlock's Excavations. - Moses, Texts, and Textiles in Cell A. - A Monastic School in Cell B? - Concluding Remarks. - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: BUCKING Scott, Scribes and Schoolmasters? On Contextualizing Coptic and Greek Ostraca Excavated at the Monastery of Epiphanius.
Journal of Coptic Studies 9 (2007) pp. 21-47, 2 tabl. et pll. 11-15.
